kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.
Opens a browser with specified options and navigates to the given site URL.

kw.name: Login
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Logs in to the application using the provided URL, username, and password.

kw.name: VerifyDashboardIsDisplayed
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: VerifyPageTitleIsCorrect
Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
Verifies that the page title matches the expected title.

kw.name: Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.
Verifies that the dashboard page is displayed correctly.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: This test case verifies that the user is able to successfully Login and Logout to OrangeHRM using Page Object
